message: Yeah. I'm getting married in less than 2 weeks...what's your excuse? ;)
@blogkitten gratz on that LOL and good excuse
It's only an "excuse" in so far as that I'm going to be gone from work for 2 weeks and there's too many projects I have to have completed before I leave on Friday.
@spencer have you watched the Zero Punctuation video review of Minecraft? HILARIOUS. http://www.escapistmagazine.com/videos/view/zero-punctuation/2680-Minecraft
Marriage is no excuse! Minecraft is ;)
Sorry, was a little busy with work, then went interstate / offline over Easter.
I have resisted minecraft so far, but caved & bought portal 2 the other day, so between that, work & heading to US soon, I may be a little light on for next few weeks ;p
Ive been pretty busy lately havent had much time to get on
Pownce the Convore group hasn't been as active as Pownce was. I do like Convore though. It seems popular with the dev community.
my friends and I use it to death for minecraft (I'm on a different timezone so I keep up with server news on it :-p)
@spencer be epic to connect minecraft chat and convore
I even built some convore-o-saurs out of appreciation.
it really would. So far we use it as a forum / discussion. Pretty much like how I think convore was intended to be used!
